CustomField.formula: IF (Invoice_Subtotal__c = 0, "", IF ( Invoice_Subtotal__c = Enhancement_Attributable_Amount__c , "Match" , IF ( Invoice_Subtotal__c = Software_Attributable_Amount_total__c , "Match" , IF ( Invoice_Subtotal__c = ( Software_Attributable_Amount_total__c + Enhancement_Attributable_Amount__c ), "Match" ,"MISMATCH"))))
CustomField.label: Amount Check
